alert.note: Alert for Camden; Gloucester; Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Salem; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:22AM EST until January 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches, with local amounts up to 3 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern and southern New Jersey, southeast Pennsylvania, northeast Maryland and northern Delaware. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will continue to develop across the area early this morning then change over to snow from northwest to southeast right around sunrise. Temperatures are forecast to drop to near freezing during the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Camden; Gloucester; Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Salem; Western Monmouth
